name: Submarine Expeditions
description:
Welcome to our little pixelart submarine game, called 'Submarine Expeditions'. In which you have to guide your Submarine to the bottom of the ocean.

The rules are very simple. 

The submarine is steered indirectly by the little man (Dave). So to turn right, you have to go to that button and click it.

To move use a/d or <-/-> and to jump the space bar. To press a button click the left Mouse button. Be careful, if the submarine turns, the paths change.

Finally, a little tip: Don't forget that you can switch off the engine. In tricky situations you can react much better that way.

And now have fun with 'Submarine Expeditions'.

At the end some credits:

Thanks to my friend, who made this game with me, but unfortunately doesn't want to be named.

The music in the game is a mix of  a song from there:https://www.musicfox.com/info/kostenlose-gemafreie-musik.php  and some underwater sounds from here:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCASiqmfYr9dXqZAdap8AfcQ  and here:https://www.videvo.net/sound-effect/underwater-bubble-by-pe311303/260540/

Changelog:

- Fixed a bug where the video at the end didn't show

- Decreased Submarine speed

- Decreased Seabomb damage
